title: Frangipane tart with custard
description: A Bakewell tart by any other name. Use the jam of your choice - raspberry is the classic option, though cherry also works well.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 23cm/9in deep-sided, loose bottomed tart tin.
ingredients: 250g/9oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
1 vanilla pod, split and seeds scraped out (pod reserved)
